raw_comment: I notice a line and dots with names on them. I wounder why Brazil and Mali is at the bottom. Be people are getting better where I am.  The graph is showing how good each country is getting with each generation. "What do the adults think about their country".
ace_sentences: I notice dots on the line.
The dots have names on them.
Brazil is at the bottom of the graph.
Mali is at the bottom of the graph.
I wonder why Brazil is at the bottom of the graph.
I wonder why Mali is at the bottom of the graph.
People are getting better where I am.
The graph shows how good each country is getting with each generation.
The question is: What do the adults think about their country?
